member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_SID
member.summary: The LSA_TRANSLATED_SID structure is used with the function to return information about the that identifies an account.

summary.para: A value from the enumeration type that identifies the type of SID.
If Use has one of the following values, one or both of the RelativeId or DomainIndex members of LSA_TRANSLATED_SID is not valid. These members are valid if Use has any other value.

listheader.description: The DomainIndex member is valid, but the RelativeId member is not valid and must be ignored.
Both DomainIndex and RelativeId are not valid and must be ignored.
Both DomainIndex and RelativeId members are not valid and must be ignored.

member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_SID.RelativeId
member.summary: Specifies the relative identifier (RID) of the account's SID. The RID identifies the account relative to the domain referenced by the DomainIndex member. The account's complete SID consists of the domain SID followed by the RID.

summary.para: Specifies the zero-based index of an entry in the structure returned by the function. This entry contains the name and SID of the domain in which the account was found.
If there is no corresponding domain for an account, this member contains a negative value.
